content.rendered:
Directed by Prabu Solomon

Written by Ravi Bhushan Kumar. Prabu Solomon. Prabu Solomon

Cast Raghu Babu. Rana Daggubati(Bandev). Abudhar Al Hassan(Chief Editor). Zoya Hussain(Arvi). Rajiv Kachroo(Rajiv Contractor). Anant Mahadevan(Kanakamedala Raja Gopalam). Shriya Pilgaonkar(Vaishnavi). Pulkit Samrat(Abeer). Vishnu Vishal(Maaran)

Languages Telugu. Tamil.

Producers. Ajmal Koya Appu. Inder Singh Bariya. Pradeep Dwivedi. Sunil Lulla. Bhavana Mounica. Sushil Tirwadkar.

Production. Eros Worldwide. Eros Worldwide
